caption: Post covid beef selection was generic only had 8 beers, food completely limited,service was good
Very friendly staff, a great selection of self pour beers, wines, and kombucha and decent food too.  Highly recommend
Good experience, very knowledgeable employees. Food was good as well.

Great outdoor patio space for these pandemic times. When it opens back up, there's a hundred taps that you can freely try out with a card payment system. Lots of beers (more stouts and sours than I've seen in DTLA), ciders, and even kombucha!

Seriously excellent beer choices here. And our server was freaking excellent. Lee really knows his beers. Even though we’re still in covid times - dining outside in the extreme cold, and with the nearby fire station occasionally blasting fire truck sirens - our server Lee totally made up for it all.
Quick service.  Great food.

Great service and tasty beer. Would love to come here after the limited options have lifted because the full menu looks amazing! Very thankful this place is open amid everything and the staff members are dope!

This place is amazing! We're came from Arizona because we saw this place in a YouTube video, and we were not disappointed. The hot dog it self was very juicy. And the toppings are amazing! This is a must.
Best hot dog in the universe. Also best customer service. Highly recommend the house dog, elote dog, and flaming corn. Oooooo it hit different.
(Translated by Google) Very delicious the beers and the food  (Original) Muy deliciosas las cervezas y la comida
Tap In! Diablo wings...
The wine and turkey burgers ...Its spacious outdoor seating. Baseball Baseball....Oh the tap beers 46 of them...
Great drinks
Very friendly staff
Once we got a server everything was great. He was very patient, friendly, and attentive; the food was great.
there was fast and courteous service. it has a good interior.
Good food, good service. Not a whole lot of variety
Great local brews and bites. Hidden gem in South Park
cool location to meet with coworkers. next time i'll be back with my friends. it has a good atmosphere.
Great service and the beer is spot on. Food is done right and portions are for sharing.
This place was amazing, food and drinks was good.
Food is amazing. !! Definitely coming back to try out their breakfast menu.

username: VTL Virtual Tour In Los Angeles

caption: Not really the best choice if you’re hungry and looking for nice food. We ordered as salad with grilled chicken. Chicken was definitely cold and didn’t taste fresh. We also got popcorn cauliflower and brussel sprouts and beside looooots of …
'Rona hindered the experience... Super fun place... Just be careful out there!

Pretty cool little Tap Room.  They have a line of taps, you serve yourself what you want and how much you want and they charge by the ounce.   You link a tap card to your credit card that measures how much you drank and you are charged …
Great selection of beer and good food
Great beer selection. I love the pour yourselfand pay by the ounce concept. Also happened to be there for happy hour on taco tuesday, and the carnitas tacos were BOMB!
Good food     small portion and  very expensive
Lee was extremely nice, friendly, and explained how things work simply. Nice atmosphere, clean, and a unique, fun system of self-serve taps. Wish I couldve spent more time there! :D
This place is awesome. They have a ton of beer, cider and wine. All self serve with a tap card. You pay by the ounce. The food was amazing! I recommend the Popcorn Cauliflower. Definitely a gem.
Found myself a new joint! Very nice here, roomy and airy and a nice outdoor deck as well. Great beers on tap.
Great beer selection. The fact that you can drink two ounces of each of their beers and have fun tasting it all is cool and unique. Food is average but good for a bar.
Great beer selection.

For a Sunday night, it was practically deserted compared to the 540 Club; it's a nice place to converse, drink beer, play pool/darts, and make out.  I can only imagine how packed it must get for Tuesday Trivia nights.

For a beer drinker with commitment issues (sorry, honey!) this place is a dream. Cool space. Friendly, knowledgeable staff. And more self-pour taps than I've seen anywhere in LA or otherwise. Taps are mostly beer (duh) but also a handful of …
Good food, great drinks

Always a great spot with a large variety of brews from everywhere including wine and others.
Love this place and love their many beers! Great open atmosphere to bring a group of friends!! Always recommend this place!

This could be a really awesome place to watch a game, but they need to play the game over the speakers more. Food is great, staff is fun and knowledgeable, and the beer selection is fantastic. Highly recommend
Great place to try lots of different beers. Their food is always good and the service is great. Awesome place for a party!
Excellent beer selection! Was there for taco Tuesday and happy hour... carnitas tacos were bomb!
Very nice, they have taps to draw your own beer and wines. Also great food
Great selection of beers, the food is only just okay.
Good place to taste various beers and ciders.  Good food and looking to go back again.

Lots of seating space and a patio.  Staff is very friendly and helpful. They will show you how to pour drinks by yourself. The food is good.  There is a large selection of beer, ciders, and wine - a lot of them local!

Fantastic location. Huge beer selection. The food is good and has many TVs to watch sports. I wish there was a big TV outside or pointed towards the patio area so I can come and hang with my dog. The staff are the friendliest. Mark was very …
Absolutely love the space, wine and beer program and food. We also love Toni's Pets Concierge and were happy to connect with our South Park dog community!

This place is cool as a concept but so expensive, you’d think you were pouring liquid gold!  One of the bar staff was rude too which was unfortunate. Go here for the fun of pouring your own beer but only if you’ve just been paid...

What a lovely surprise!  This place has an array of DIY tap beer and a small section of wine on tap. You purchase a tap card, pick up a glass, and tap anywhere on the beer of choice that charged you per oz. genius  As a non IPA fan, I fell …
Pour your own bevy!
First time there and awesome customer service! 👍
Great food, great beer, what else do you need?
Sooooo many yummo beer choices. Better than average bar food. Nice patio. Be careful though as the bill rises quickly when you're using their "debit card" for pour access
Good food, great beer selection that changes often, fun place to come and hang out.
The street fries and burger were so good! Like how they have the beer selection scattered all around the place
Fun way to drink beer. Self pour from 60+ taps. Sausage plate was pretty tasty. Burgers were as well. Nice late afternoon spot
Great staff. Great beer. Nice decor. Food was phenomenal. Nothing to complain about. It was bomb.
Well priced with excellent eats ($12-14 a plate), cool techy tap dispensing!  Nice patio space. Bathroom upstairs - to help patrons judge their intoxication level?  😂

Not a big menu to choose from, although they have 100 different beers/wines and ciders on tap. The food was decent. The flavor was there but then chicken for the chicken sandwich wasn't crispy even though it was breaded

My first experience with a pay by the oz, pour yourself bar. Definitely a bit on the pricey side but this is LA after all.  The server working that day really knew her stuff and clearly had a passion for beer. Very helpful in getting us started trying out the self-pour system.  Will definitely come back next E3 season.
Comedy show every last Tues of the month is incredible. But stop over charging for beer!!!

I'm impressed! This was my first time there and a friend invited me so I didn't really even know what to expect and when I saw 60+ beer handles I was excited. And it's a pour your own which was fun. I ended up maxing out at 32 ounces. I …
Pretty good food, if you like to drink this would be a cool spot at night.
The concept is absolutely great and works very well! You can try so many different beers that you'll surely find something you love. Absolutely recommended!
The staff was so amazing, and the beers...  OMG!!  Thos place is the best place and concept in DTLA!!
Very good food and beer
Very cool idea. I got to try out a few different beers and it was not that expensive at the end of the night.
I like the beer concept, the chicken wings are so good. But the food price doesn't make sense. I bet they will generate 10x more traffic if they reconsider that.
So many beers, so little time!
Awesome selection of beers! They also had 1 kombucha and few wine options on tap. Food was excellent!
Pour your own beer and over 70 taps? Craft beer heaven! I've yet to try the food coming out of the kitchen but it looked great!  Lofty space with two floors and a sun catching patio
The host was experienced and attentive the burger could have been missing the bacon.

Absolutely, try this place out! The process is: you pay for a tap card, i believe we paid $20, you tap your card to the beer, the beer is sorted in sections to find the ones you like the best and even the ones you are wanting to explore, …

Great place , good food and mostly a great beer selection.  I was impressed by the layout of the place it really welcoming and has easy flow. The one negative I had was were the IPAs  available were not the best in my book.
Good place if you don't mind pouring your own beers. Good food, too.
Great selection of self seve beers and wine on tap. Fun place. Nice staff.

Well obviously im reviewing because the experience was very horrible on the "General Managers" side. I had a party of 13 and called in advance if my 6 year old nephew was welcomed, they replied yes kids are welcomed. 20 minutes after …
Solid food and great beer selection!
Always something unusual and tasty on draft. Nice little patio to hang out on. Street fries and a salad are delicious. Burgers are solid.
A bit pricy, but food was perfectly executed. Great Mac n cheese.
Great food, great space, playlist is solid classic rock choices. The taps are reasonably priced, easy to use, and easy to understand.
Honestly, the best concept for a bar that I've seen! Many different great selections of beer and wine and it's all reasonably priced. Didn't try the food, but looked delicious
Super cool place for beer! You get a cool card and tap it and boom! You get to pour your own beer. Great selection of all kinds of beer! I will definitely be back!
Great place for beer, plenty of TVs to watch, great outdoor space.
Unique and fun. 50+ tap beverages, loved the cider from Salem, Oregon. Food was delicious - try the bread pudding with blueberry sauce. Great seating indoor and outdoor. Friendly staff. Thanks!
Why go anywhere else? Sort of a self- serve Yard House & seem like as many taps. Epic space w room to mingle & local sports on their many TVs
Really cool concept, good beer and great food!
Pour your own beer, pay by the ounce, big space, outdoor area, 70ish selections

(Translated by Google) A great concept but the beers are quite expensive.  (Original) Un super concept mais les bieres sont assez cheres.
Fun, clean and quick if you want it to be. Definitely worth going. I like it better than Yardhouse by far.
Nice space... friendly help...70 taps...pour ur own
Great choice of beers, nice concept of draft self service

pricey for beer

Aside from a good mix of taps, the shining star here is really the food and service. I found a handful of beers I really liked, but the overall selection found be rated a C+... nothing completely special or rare but there are some notable …
Loved the selection and ambiance. Nice patio.

Great food, huge beer selection and cool vibe. Our first time visiting, take a minute to register and get a tap card, use the tap card for whatever beer or beers you want up to 32oz or day. You pay by the ounce at the end of the meal and …
Similar to Yogurtland for adults!!! Pick and choose your beer and pour accordingly...
Fun experience but the beer is the same price as places in the area but those places provide the service aspect of a bar (i.e. giving advice on the drinks based on what you're looking for)

I really liked it here, its so nice that i can try sips of different beers to see what matches my taste. Food is average priced for what you get in downtown restraunts nowadays although i havent tried it or seen the food portions. Beer …
Super chill spot to try lots of different beers n tasty food!
Great beer selection the food is insanely good try the cali greens
Great beer selection and good food, but feels a little bit pricey.
Pour your own tap room with a wide breath of beer. Rose is always tapped tho. Thirsty thots seem to drain the kegs. Sours, ipa, and stouts are all represented here well.

This place is awesome! You get to pick your own beer on the wall and try as many as you can. You pay by the ounce so you don't have to commit to a beer if it's not your taste. The foot was really good too. I got the pretzel bites and the angel wings and both were delicious.  Highly recommend.

If you like craft beers you'll have tons of options. Down sides, they don't have a beer menu so you have to go walk to the tv that had a slideshow of the beers then find the tap number, the beers are app over so you may have to do some …
I wish the beer was just a bit cheaper but is about $ 7.2 a 12 oz glass.
Cool atmosphere

I didn't go for the beer so I can't comment on that other then to say that they have an enormous selection! I dropped in for a small plate. I ordered the popcorn cauliflower and Angel wings.  The cauliflower was amazing and I will be …
Adult heaven! So many beers and so much fun pouring your own

When we went they had only been open for a week, so they were still in soft open mode. I liked what I had, the beer selection was great and the food was good. Staff was friendly and helpful and the GM, Marc(?), was super cool.
Great beer selection, cool place!  Look forward to coming back!
Great place to sample beers on tap by the ounce - they also have ciders and kombucha on tap! It's fun to sample and pour yourself from the taps.  Menu is great and vegetarian friendly!

Great space. Food is is really good.  Really fun spot. You can sample beers by the ounce.  We had burgers, chicken and funnel cake, fresh veggies, Cobb salad, and a beer float (large group). Impressed the food quality. Outdoor patio area is a nice touch. Cool spot before a game.
Bringing the tap-n-drink concept to DTLA, it’s a welcome addition to DTLA. The Hefe I tried was really good; looking forward to digging into the food offerings in the future.
